graphic.description: Determines which graphic layout to show and enables the graphic slot when value is not control or null.

group.description: Used to group the internal radios together.

value.description: Value associated with this list item.

tabindex.description: Reflects tabindex and sets internal tab indices.

text.description: Trimmed textContent of the list item.

left.description: Displays the checkbox on the left. Overrides graphic.

disabled.description: Reflects disabled and sets internal disabled attributes.

twoline.description: Activates the two-line variant and enables the secondary slot.

multipleGraphics.description: Allows arbitrary width for multiple slotted graphics.

hasMeta.description: Activates the meta layout tile and enables the meta slot.

noninteractive.description: Disables focus and pointer events for the list item.

selected.description: Denotes that the list item is selected.
